general_advisory: Rainfall is expected during the next five days. Farmers are advised to spray only when the sky becomes clear and use a sticker with the spray solution. Proper arrangement for storing rainwater should be made in the field for irrigation during dry spells. Field preparation for non-paddy crops like pulse, oilseeds, and vegetables should be done in upland conditions with early sowing/transplanting. Plant protection measures should be taken for crops with possibilities of pest and disease build-up.

advisory: Complete sowing where direct seeding is practiced and incorporate well-decomposed FYM or cow dung. Apply DAP and MoP per acre during the last ploughing. Sow short-duration varieties behind the plough, treating the seed with Trichoderma viride or Carbendazim before sowing.
